description:
Actor Nicky Katt led a surprising career in Hollywood from his first role on an episode of Fantasy Island in 1980 to his later appearances in quite a few modern day hits. Sadly, it’s been confirmed that Katt has died at age 54. The unfortunate news “was reported by his friends and by attorney John [...]

title: Actor Nicky Katt Dead At 54

description:

It’s no surprise then, with films like Hereditary, Midsommar, and Beau Is Afraid under his belt, that fans are anxious for his next movie Eddington – the trailer for which has been shared below. title: First Trailer For Ari Aster’s ‘Eddington’ Released
